mainVisual.description1: By constructing various architectural spaces within the virtual space, the concept of the near future takes shape.
mainVisual.description3: You can also enter the virtual space with your friends, interact with them, participate in events, and experience the urban space of the future one step ahead of others.
mainVisual.description6: Through comony's architectural metaverse, we offer experiences that transcend time and space, from the past to the present and into the future.
mainVisual.subTitle: Designing the future by the architectural metaverse.
mainVisual.title2: Gain insight about architecture with the Architectural Metaverse
mainVisual.title2Vertical: Gain insight about architecture with the Architectural Metaverse
